content:
Dear User,

We are pleased to invite you to join CITIIS Management Platform as [role].

To accept the invitation, please click on the following link and proceed for registration.

Please ignore this email if you think this is not intended for you.

Note: Link will expire in [linkExpire] hours.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: Invitation from CITIIS Management

content:
Dear [fullName],

This is an update on your user account on CITIIS Management Platform.

Your account has been [state]

In case of any issues, please contact cmp@niua.org.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Updates on your User Account

content:
Dear [fullName],

Welcome to CITIIS Management Platform. This is to confirm your access on CMP.

In case of any issues while using the platform, please contact cmp@niua.org.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: Welcome to CITIIS Management Platform

content:
Hi [fullName],

You are invited by a user of CMP to collaborate on the document [documentName].

You can click here to access it.

Please ignore if you think this is not intended for you.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Invitation to Access a New Document

content:
Dear [fullName],

You have received a new message on CMP.

Here is an excerpt. [content]

Click here to view the full message.


Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: New Message on CMP | [subject] on [timestamp]

content:
Dear [fullName],

As requested by you, [otp] is the One Time Password (OTP) to update your Mobile Number on CITIIS Management Platform

.Best Regards,
CMP Administrator

content:
Hi [fullName],

You have a tag suggestion on CMP.

You can click this link to view it.
Please ignore if you think this is not intended for you.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: A Tag has been Suggested

content:
Dear [userName],

A tag suggested by you has been approved. You can click this link to view the details.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Tag Approval Notification

content:
Dear [userName],

A tag suggested by you has been rejected. You can click this link to view it.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Tag Rejection Notification

content:
Dear [fullName],

The password entered by you on CITIIS Management Platform is incorrect. Please click on Forgot Password on CMP's login page to reset your password, if you have a problem in accessing your account.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Platform Access Error - Invalid Password

content:
Dear [fullName],

As updated on the CITIIS Management Platform, your Email ID has been changed to [newMail].

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Email ID Updated

content:
Dear [fullName],

Your document [documentName], is published on CITIIS Management Platform. You can click this link to access it.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator

content:
Dear [fullName],

Your document [documentName], is unpublished from CITIIS Management Platform. You can click this link to access it.

content:
Dear [fullName],

The document [documentName] on CITIIS Management Platform, is replaced with a new document. You can click this link to access it.

CMP Administrator

content:
Dear [fullName],

Document [documentName], has been updated with new [text]. You can click this link to access it.

content:
